subject: problems with swing interface
msgSnippet: Hi, I am using the batch interface to run my tests. In  main() i am accepting input from the user, it works fine. When i execute the tests from the swing
messageBody:
Hi,

I am using the batch interface to run my tests. In main() i am accepting
input from the user, it works fine. When i execute the tests from the swing
interface , it does not accept user input and so all my tests give errors.

Please somebody suggest a solution.

Thank You,
Salil.
